articles.description: Gareth Southgate says "if I can't enjoy this moment then it's a waste of time" after England reach the Euro 2024 semi-finals.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate: England boss says 'if I can't enjoy this moment it's a waste of time' as his side reach semi-finals

articles.description: Bukayo Saka is Stuart Pearce for the TikTok generation. The England winger found redemption in style - done with class, skill and likeability.
articles.title: Bukayo Saka: Special moment of Euros redemption for England star

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Netherlands vs Turkey in the UEFA Euro 2024 quarter-final.
articles.title: Netherlands vs Turkey LIVE: Euro 2024 football team news, line-ups, kick-off time, prediction & latest updates

articles.description: Emma Raducanu knows all about qualifiers upsetting the odds. The boot is on the other foot as she faces Lulu Sun for a spot in the Wimbledon quarter-finals.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Emma Raducanu ready to face 'dangerous' Lulu Sun for place in quarter-finals

articles.description: Andy Murray's Wimbledon career is over after Emma Raducanu pulls out of their planned appearance in the mixed doubles.
articles.title: Andy Murray's Wimbledon career over after Emma Raducanu pulls out of mixed doubles

articles.description: Seven-time champion Novak Djokovic comes from a set down to book his place in the Wimbledon fourth round with victory over Australia's Alexei Popyrin.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 results: Novak Djokovic comes from behind to beat Alexei Popyrin

articles.description: George Russell says he and Mercedes team-mate Lewis Hamilton expect a “good fight” for victory in the British Grand Prix with Lando Norris and Max Verstappen.
articles.title: George Russell relishes British GP fight with Hamilton & Norris

articles.description: Gregor Townsend's side overcome a slow start to score 11 tries in a one-sided victory over Canada in Ottawa.
articles.title: Scotland demolish Canada in opening match of summer tour

articles.description: Ireland captain Peter O'Mahony says his side were punished by World Cup winners South Africa in a thrilling first Test in Pretoria.
articles.title: South Africa 27-20 Ireland: We were 'punished' by hosts - O'Mahony

articles.description: Head coach Warren Gatland says it is just where "we are at the moment" after guiding Wales to statistically their worst position in World Rugby rankings.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Wales coach reflects on Australia defeat in Sydney
